Question: NVIDIA Corporation CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
NVIDIA Corporation

GeForce RTX 40 SUPER Series Graphics Cards

- Introducing GeForce RTX 4080 SUPER, RTX 4070 Ti SUPER, and RTX 4070 SUPER graphics cards, faster than their predecessors, enhancing games, apps, and AI tasks
- GeForce RTX 4070 SUPER launches January 17th, starting at $599, with 20% more cores than RTX 4070, suitable for 1440p gaming and creating
- GeForce RTX 4070 Ti SUPER launches January 24th, starting at $799, featuring 16GB frame buffer, suitable for high refresh 1440p panels and video editing
- GeForce RTX 4080 SUPER launches January 31st, starting at $999, with more cores and fastest video memory, suitable for 4K fully ray-traced gaming and 3D rendering
